attributes.action: Make it illegal to promote, advertise and pressure vaccines to the public
attributes.additional_details: The government should guarantee the freedom of the general public to make choices themselves without any interference in their independent choice.
attributes.background: The parliament should discuss and make it an offense to actively promote and advertise any vaccines to the general public and politicians should not pressure or promote others to take or not to take any vaccines. Healthcare companies should remain neutral and not pressure patients

rejection.details:
We're not sure what specific actions you are referring to when you say you want it to be illegal to "promote, advertise and pressure" people into accepting a Covid-19 vaccination. We're unsure whether you want to stop people being invited to have a vaccination or something else. 

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957.
